description: This file declares the interface for MultiLAN SBAPI functions related to data model integration in a CCSP environment, defining routines for initialization, retrieval of network configurations like IP interfaces, bridges, DHCP pools, and WiFi settings.
external_files: <library headers for data types like ANSC_STATUS, ANSC_HANDLE, PANSC_HANDLE, PULONG>

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanInit
methods.description: Initializes the MultiLAN data model SBAPI with the provided handle and context.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanUnload
methods.description: Unloads or cleans up the MultiLAN data model SBAPI using the specified context.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetPrimaryLanIpIf
methods.description: Retrieves the primary LAN IP interface address.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityIpIf
methods.description: Retrieves the Home Security IP interface address.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetPrimaryLanBridge
methods.description: Retrieves the primary LAN bridge information.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetPrimaryLanBridgeHsPorts
methods.description: Retrieves the hardware security ports associated with the primary LAN bridge.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetPrimaryLanDhcpv4ServerPool
methods.description: Retrieves the DHCPv4 server pool configuration for the primary LAN.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityBridge
methods.description: Retrieves the Home Security network bridge configuration.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityBridgePorts
methods.description: Retrieves the ports associated with the Home Security bridge.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityDhcpv4ServerPool
methods.description: Retrieves the DHCPv4 server pool configuration for Home Security.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityWiFiRadio
methods.description: Retrieves WiFi radio configuration for Home Security.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityWiFiSsid
methods.description: Retrieves the WiFi SSID for Home Security.

methods.name: CosaDmlMlanGetHomeSecurityWiFiAp
methods.description: Retrieves the WiFi Access Point configuration for Home Security.
